oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Civil War-themed advertisement for J & P Coats' Spool Cotton
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Advertisement for J & P. Coats', maker of six cord spool cotton. The advertisement features an image of Gen. Ulysses S. Grant and several other officers at Grant's headquarters. The illustration is by H.A. Ogden. Copyrighted in 1885 by Brig. Gen. S. B. Holobird, Quartermaster General, the advertisement plays to Coats' role in manufacturing the wartime uniforms depicted in the drawing and to the deep adulation for Grant following his death from throat cancer in 1885.
